attributes.action: Get parliament to pass a motion to hold a general election on 15th October 2019
attributes.additional_details:
Many MP’s of opposition parties have called for people to have a say and vote for the deal they want. Now is that time to speak but Labour and all other parties are denying us the public our say!
Urge anyone who has a sense of frustration with this whole mess to sign this petition and get this whole process moving forward!
Thank you
attributes.background:
Labour and all opposition to Brexit have repeatedly called for a General Election to break Brexit deadlock. 
Now they have the opportunity to hold an election they have turned it down hiding behind this no deal Brexit Bill!
Let’s show that the people want their say no by having a snap election
